鞂字的基本解释

鞂
jiē
古同“秸”。

鞂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiē］
［《集韻》訖黠切，入黠，見。］
同“秸1”。
农作物的茎秆。

鞂字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　鞂； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1386第36
【集韻】同稭。

【廣韻】古黠切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】訖黠切，?音戛。【說文】禾橐去其皮，祭天以爲席。【禮·禮器】莞簟之安，而橐鞂之設。【註】穗去實曰鞂。【廣韻】萆鞂。【集韻】本作稭。又作䕸。
鞂字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鞂字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yin
jiē
The ancient same "straw".
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiē］
["Jiyun" cut into the corner, see. ]
Same as "Straw 1".
The stalks of crops.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [He Zi Department] 　鞂; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1386 Page 36
【Ji Yun】Same as straw. [Guang Yun] Ancient Rhyme [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme] Long Rhyme,? Yin Can. [Said the text] He Lun peeled off its skin and used it as a feast to worship the sky. [Ritual·Ritual Vessels] The smile is peaceful, but the setting is for the Qianqian. [Note] Sui Qu Shi Yue Qian. [Guang Yun] 萆鞂. [Ji Yun] This is a straw. Also made Pi.
